column2: this deep dish pizza wasn't amazingly great to me. It was good
column3: but not that great. The cheese on the pizza was the best part though. It was cheesy and gooey. The honey BBQ wings were the best. I wish we could've had ordered more of that. The salad was also good. The service was great
column4: except the part where my bf asked for a side of ranch dip for the pizza
column5: it never came to our table until we asked again. The waiter thought my bf wanted the marinara sauce.....I wonder how the waiter mistaken ranch dip with marinara sauce?? Â But overall
column6: everything was great and we enjoyed our first meal in ChiTown.
